text: Glidewell is an unincorporated community in Greene County, Missouri, United States.GNIS data for Glidewell Glidewell is located approximately four miles north of Springfield, just east of Missouri Route 13 on a county road that accesses McDaniel Lake on the Little Sac River.Missouri Atlas & Gazetteer, DeLorme, 1998, First edition, p. 52, ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Greene County, Missouri Category:Springfield metropolitan area, Missouri Category:Unincorporated communities in Missouri
title: Glidewell, Missouri
